basics.name: Eric Beahan
basics.label: Engineer/Architect
basics.summary: Experienced security, infrastructure, and software engineer with extensive experience delivering security solutions in enterprise, reseller, and vendor environments.

work.summary: Engineering operations lead and systems architect for the CYDERES cybersecurity and EMDR platform.
highlights: Design and manage the threat detection pipelines that ingest billions of customer events per month
Manage a entirely cloud-based as-a-service cybersecurity offering
Architect and manage multiple Kubernetes clusters across public cloud providers and customer premises
Deploy and manage dozen of services running across AWS, Azure, and GCP using Terraform, Packer, and SaltStack
Develop microservices written in Python, Node.js, and Golang
Development and implementation of parsers for multiple SIEM platforms: Azure Sentinel, Google Chronicle, Splunk, Exabeam, and Elastic SIEM
Extensive experience building data and metric ingestion platforms on Elasticsearch, Logstash, Prometheus, and Grafana.
Architect and manage IAM and SSO customer connectivity with federation between Okta, PingOne, Azure AD, ADFS, and JumpCloud

work.summary: Senior engineer on the technical operations team support the infrastructure for the leading provider in the digital threats management space
Network automation developer responsible for building and running a network automation framework supporting the network and security engineering teams
Security engineer focused on network security for a large financial services organization
Worked in several aspects of support and managed services for one of the largest cybersecurity solutions provider in North America

awards.title: Pillar of Excellence
awards.summary: Recipient of the annual company award in the area of trusty and integrity.
